entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -16.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 10:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -16.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
